var isInCartFunction=function isInCartFunction(){!this.isInCart?this.isInCart=true:this.isInCart=false;return this.isInCart;};// Method used for setting quantity state in <RouteSwitch /> if user deletes input then quantity is defaulted to 1
var setQuantity=function setQuantity(){var quant=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;if(isNaN(quant)){this.productTotal=0;return this.quantity='';};this.productTotal=productPrice*quant;this.quantity=quant;return quant;};// Both of these methods are currently unnecessary since [input type='number'] does their job
var incrementQuantity=function incrementQuantity(){this.productTotal+=productPrice;return this.quantity=this.quantity+=1;};var decrementQuantity=function decrementQuantity(){this.productTotal-=productPrice;return this.quantity=this.quantity-=1;};return{productName:productName,productCategory:productCategory,productTotal:productTotal,imgSrc:imgSrc,imgAlt:imgAlt,isInCart:isInCart,isInCartFunction:isInCartFunction,quantity:'',incrementQuantity:incrementQuantity,decrementQuantity:decrementQuantity,productPrice:productPrice,setQuantity:setQuantity};};// NEED TO DRY
